mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room_category WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort ASC, category_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_category (category_name, description, price_min, price_max, cover_img, sort, status, create_time, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{description}, #{priceMin}, #{priceMax}, #{coverImg}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE room_category SET category_name = #{categoryName}, description = #{description}, price_min = #{priceMin}, price_max = #{priceMax}, cover_img = #{coverImg}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
